changedWidth() - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.views.GameScreen
Method used for animation purposes Changes the width of a pown for the illusion of a flip motion.
checkDiagonalLeft(Cell, int) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Check if putting a powns in this cell will lead to a legal along the left diagonal Also fills the tempFlips variable with the cell to flip
checkDiagonalRight(Cell, int) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Check if putting a powns in this cell will lead to a legal move along the right diagonal Also fills the tempFlips variable with the cell to flip
checkHorizontal(Cell, int) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Check if putting a powns in this cell will lead to a legal move horizontally-wise Also fills the tempFlips variable with the cell to flip
checkVertical(Cell, int) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Check if putting a powns in this cell will lead to a legal move vertically-wise Also fills the tempFlips variable with the cell to flip
